name: Panda KungFu Simulator Dash
description:
Man has dehorned Pandas so much so that Pandas are now on the edge of extinction.
Experience how it is to be a species which is now on the edge of extinction just because some people liked its Horn and take the revenge on behalf of those who died .
Where there is shedding of innocent blood, there is no atonement for the land.Show No mercy and leave nothing undamaged spread complete destruction.
